body:
i guess this is it guys... good bye! i am will still be active on avicus forums and in for the occasional play but probably not for long, i have got into pot pvp finding out that i am good at it.

and btw ignore this if you hate it: i am underated..


i hope you guys will respect my choice to leave and not abuse and bye to my aussie bros

holden58, ledlaup and OPTOBAT!
